articles.content: Marvel Comics hosted a Symbiote spectacular panel at C2E2 today, which featured C.B. Cebulski and Venom editor Devin Lewis, along with David Pepose (EXTREME VENOMVERSE), Sabir Pirzada (CULT OF CARNAG… [+9703 chars]
